summary: Adds a chest to the entrance of Riverwood containing a full set of daedric armour and some weapons.
descriptionHtml:
GUESS WHO SURVIVED HELGEN... YEAH THE DRAGONBORN THAT'S YOU MAN YOU GOT TO LOOK THE PART SO WE PUT THESE DOPE THREADS IN A CHEST FOR THE CHAMPION OF LEGENDS. BEAT UP CHICKENS AND LITTLE GIRLS EASILY WITH THESE END GAME ITEMS THAT YOU CAN GET IN 5 SECONDS WITH THE CONSOLE BUT NAH DOVAHMAN I PUT THEM IN A CHEST FOR YOU. YOU'RE WELCOME.

Why do people keep downloading this
author: Carizzma
